body.p: When asked for your password on a website, what do you check to determine whether the website is a phishing site?

multiple_choice.choice: Check that the page colors are correct.
Check that the URL at the top of the browser is correct.
Check that the text headline is correct.
Check that the copyright notice is correct.

response.feedback: The page colors are easily copied, and so mean nothing.
Check that the URL is, for example, www.ebay.com, not a phishing domain such as log.in.now.ebay.baddyguy.ru
The text headline is easily copied, so it means nothing.
The copyright notice is easily copied, so it means nothing.
